name: UIAccessibilityContainerDataTable
desc: Methods that convey information about the contents of a table.

items.name: func accessibilityDataTableCellElement(forRow: Int, column: Int) -> UIAccessibilityContainerDataTableCell?
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element for the specified cell.

items.name: func accessibilityColumnCount() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the total number of columns in the table.

items.name: func accessibilityRowCount() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the total number of rows in the table.

items.name: func accessibilityHeaderElements(forColumn: Int) -> [UIAccessibilityContainerDataTableCell]?
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element for the specified column header.

items.name: func accessibilityHeaderElements(forRow: Int) -> [UIAccessibilityContainerDataTableCell]?
items.desc: Returns the accessibility element for the specified row header.
